metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18197 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In mxGraphViewImageReader.java in mxGraph before 3.7.6, the SAXParserFactory instance in convert() is missing flags to prevent XML External Entity (XXE) attacks, as demonstrated by /ServerView.

criterions.comment: libjgraphx-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
